label: Ollama server url
title: Define the url of ollama server

label: Ollama model's name
title: Define the default ollama model to use.

label: Ollama allow raw results
title: Define if Ollama can return raw results.
description: If activated, Ollama can return raw results. But this is not recommended, because Leto can't parse them.

label: Default Model files to generate files for plugins.
title: Define the model instructions for ollama to generate plugin files.
description: The model file should be respecting the format of ollama's model files.

label: Model files to generate files for {{ plugin }} plugin.
title: Define the model instructions for ollama to generate {{ plugin }} files.
description: The model file should be respecting the format of ollama's model files.

label: Default Model files to discuss about plugin.
title: Define the model instructions for ollama to discuss about plugin.

label: Default Model files to discuss about {{ plugin }} plugin.
title: Define the model instructions for ollama to discuss about {{ plugin }} plugin.
